help: -t, to             send dataset to other function
other unspecified options are sent to the loaded module
modules: display list of module in lib.data directory
index:path         list of module path with reference index
<index>            index of module, for module command
<path>             specific module path in lib.data directory
module: import module (last module without source) from lib.data directory
<file>             specific module file name in lib.data directory
raws: display list of raw data in data.raw directory
index:path         list of raw data path with reference index
<index>            index of raw data, for raw command
<path>             specific raw data path in data.raw directory
raw: load raw data (last raw data without source) from data.raw directory
<file>             specific raw file name in data.raw directory
save: save dataset to destination (default: data directory)
list: display list of dataset in data directory
index:path         list of dataset path with reference index
<index>            index of dataset, for load command
<path>             specific dataset path in data directory
load: load dataset (last dataset without source) from data directory
<file>             specific dataset file name in data directory
to: Either send train set and validate set (if exists) to model thread, or send test set to test thread.
